author: Dinico Win
comment: Not only is this app aesthetically pleasing with material Design. It works perfectly both on my Gs6 edge & LG G Watch R ⌚, it syncs as it records so theirs no waiting for a sync afterwards. This is the best voice recorder so far. Also, The Google Drive ☁ save works seamlessly. I hope you guys never implement advertisements. I'd rather you take my money.
title: Wow...

author: Mohammad AlHarbi
comment: I hope I can rate this app more than 5 stars, everything is great, design, quality of recording, support android wear, backup to Drive, and tags. everything made perfectly, good job guys. Just little thing, sometimes I put tag in wrong place and I want to remove this tag but there is no choice to do that, I hope to see this in next update.
title: Amazing!!

author: Gabriel Costa
comment: Astonishingly stunning and perfectly functional, this app was the one to finally end my quest of search for a good, Material Design-compliant sound recorder. I have absolutely no complaints whatsoever: this is one of the most beautiful apps I've ever used. It's ad-free, the recordings are produced at excellent qualities, automatic Google Drive backup is an option, support for Android Wear (I don't own one, but it's nice to know this is a feature), and the ability to tag specific points along the duration of the recording is magnificent. Congratulations on this masterpiece.  [EDIT]: as things were just too good to be true, every time I open this app and record something, the songs on my internal storage disappear from my music player; the issue persists until I reboot my device.

author: David Kneale
comment: I have been disappointed and frustrated by the quality and functionality of available voice recorders for Android wear after using the excellent Galaxy Gear recorders. Having tried all available audio apps this one is by far the best and most reliable in my opinion. Nice interface and superb sound quality make this a must have app for Android wear.
title: Best Wear recorder

author: Mohana Krishnan
comment: (Update: Hi devs! A small issue which i found out just now.. When i try to place the '1 x1 widget' of Bees Recorder on my phone's homescreen, instead of placing the widget, it directly just opens the app. When i get back, the widget won't be placed either. Fix that in next update?)  Functional, clean, precise. Lot of functions with 4 sound quality options and 3 different scenes! All for free?? That's an amazing must have app for Android Wear users and others too ppl.. go ahead and download.. oh.. it's got G.drive backup too!

author: Claire Sanderson
comment: Great potential on both phone and watch, free of charge and ad-free. But two big bugs - everytime I make and listen to a recording, my music player loses all the music on my SD card, and the app freezes and has to be force closed everytime I try to delete a recording.
title: Great potential, but two big bugs

author: Andrew Wu
comment: Beautifully designed and the UI is very simple and smooth. The recordings are clear and nice. One thing I wanted to know if there is an option to clear up background noises for lecture option. I noticed there is a bit of background noise present in my recordings. But it could have been position of my phone. Just wondering.
title: Great app!

author: Saswat Mohanty
comment: Crashes everytime I connect my Lg urbane 2nd edition Andoid wear watch to phone. And the crash notification pops up some 15 times in a row. Too troublesome.

author: iRyan Rodriguez
comment: Great.Simple.Time Save. Only 3 steps; 1.)Open app  2.)Start recording  3.)Press Save BAMM!!! When it press on save, it will send your recoding to smart device or if it storage in the Smart Watch until it reconnect to your device. ( BUT Remember not at Smart Watch can storage data are on the watch.)

author: Rhythm Rice
comment: I did one test recording and then when I deleted it it deleted every single song on my phone like are you freaking serious I hate this app with a fiery passion and I will post all over the Internet how terrible it is. why? Why would you do that I absolutely hate you I literally hope you ride a motorcycle and I hope somebody bumps into you and you fall under a semi and get crushed and die. You haven't even updated the app in over a year to fix this I know you know that this bug exists but yet you don't fix
title: Deletes all of your music

author: Ibrahim Bodi
comment: Love it
title: Best recording app ever look no further.  All others are crap compared to this.  Dead easy to use aswel and its clear.  Works on note 4 with fassil founder

author: Benjamin Anderson
comment: This app works great on my lg g watch r, but constantly crashes on my lg g4 phone. Pleas fix!
title: Keeps crashing

author: Keshav Saini
comment: Tried many apps but bees just outstands others in simplicity and operation. Thanks for this wonderful app. Spreading the words right away. ☺
title: Amazing app for on the go musicians and casual recording enthusiats

author: Raniya A
comment: But I would definitely love to try out more scenes. I use it for recording my lessons  and the 'background noise cancellation'  mode
title: I LOVE IT !!!!

author: Krystal Myth
comment: Sincerely the best recording app I can even think of. No ads, free even? Easily will pay for a donation version. The widget is amazing too. Just seriously the attention to detail is above and beyond.

author: Vikram Gurram
comment: Awesome , if we can edit the flag and write the name of topic while recording or after that, and have short cut key for taging while the screen is off , like volume up or down button for tagging, it will be more simple and useful        THANKYOU

author: Lisa McCarty
comment: No ads. Love that. Flawless execution. Aesthetically pleasing. Simple UI. I do wish it had an option to name each file that's recorded, as it is now there doesn't seem to be an option to even edit the name after it's recorded. Also, the widget function is handy, but it would be easier to implement in some uses if the record widget was able to float on the screen or be added to notification bar. If these abilities were added, it would be the perfect audio recording app for android...IMO

author: Keith Miller
comment: Overall, this is a solid recording app. Auto backup to the cloud. Sound quality is very good. And the noise cancelling works very well. Recommended!

author: Arthur Shogenoff
comment: It's a great app, but how did you managed to create files with names like this "Jan 1 8:21 PM_20170101202142.mp3" ? I can't copy it anywhere, I have to rename them manually.

author: brian bicknell
comment: What a load of rubbish , does not work ,developer ignores emails , complete scam...Avoid

author: Wellington Amaral
comment: Great design, some crashes on the phone, fills up my Android watch and can't delete audio files to open up space... Had to reset my watch.

author: Steet Preacher
comment: Used to work great on my LG Urbane 2nd edition watch, but crashes everytime I open it now.  :*(

author: Pampoen Koekie
comment: Amazing, simple, practical.... The best! Thank you
title: LOVE It!

author: Lari Nurkka
comment: Maybe the only recording app on android wear which actually works. The recording is crisp, clear and as high quality as you want. Thank you for making this.

author: Luke DeWitt
comment: Works perfectly and looks great. Thank you.
title: New favorite

author: Kuran Mcqueen
comment: Does what I need for now, waiting for more features, and a way to pay the developers because this app is great! Sent the developers a email

author: James Cridland
comment: This is an excellent recorder with really good Android Wear support. Great for journalists doing interviews unobtrusively. Very nice work.

author: Brain Fist
comment: Great work by Bees Team. Awesome recorder..!
title: Proper App

author: Benjamin Garner
comment: This is the best of its kind that I found on the Play store thank you for such a great product for free

author: Patrick Evans
comment: Freezes when loading the app.

author: don frank
comment: Works and does not generate the screen overlay error that other voice recorders give on Android 7

author: Keshav Tagra
comment: Good recorder  but please add one more feature of effect echo...Please..

author: Taranjeet Singh
comment: Everything you need in a recording app

author: El Falco
comment: I am a Beekeeper, that's why I downloaded the app⚡

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: Very nice! However some more scenes and settings would be good.

author: Veena Solomon
comment: Love it!
title: Best Audio Recorder

author: Tony Rodriguez
comment: Thank you bees team

author: Jamie H
comment: Works great, shockingly great in fact

author: Prashant Rao
comment: Really simple and cleanly laid out with Google drive sync..

author: Musical Danger
comment: Record from my SmartWatch and beautiful app
title: Great recorder
